Data Preparation.Data privacy: Data anonymized and compliant with privacy regulations (GDPR, HIPAA)
Data Preparation.Test data sets: Critical test data sets (valid, invalid, edge-case) prepared

Core Functional Tests.Input validations: All input validations, error messages, and boundary conditions verified
Core Functional Tests.Notifications: Notifications, alerts, and in-app messages triggered as intended

UI & Usability.Design elements: Fonts, icons, and color palettes match design tokens
UI & Usability.Interactions: Tooltips, modals, dropdowns behave as expected
UI & Usability.Localization: Language toggling and localization function correctly

Performance.Media optimization: Images and videos optimized (WebP, lazy loading)
Performance.Console errors: No console errors or unhandled rejections

API Behavior.Endpoints: Each endpoint returns correct status codes and payloads

Data Flow.Data capture: Captured correctly at source (forms, events, APIs)
Data Flow.Duplication and data drift: No duplication or data drift between source and sink
